price: 15. Alle waa Kan idiinka dhigay dhulka hayin ee ku socda aagaggiisa waasica ah, oo wax ka cuna risiqiisa, Xaggiisa bay ahaan u soo Bixiddu (Qiyaamada).
arabic: هُوَ ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ ذَلُولٗا فَٱمۡشُواْ فِي مَنَاكِبِهَا وَكُلُواْ مِن رِّزۡقِهِۦۖ وَإِلَيۡهِ ٱلنُّشُورُ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: huwa alladhī jaʿala lakumu al-arḍa dhalūlan fa-im'shū fī manākibihā wakulū min riz'qihi wa-ilayhi al-nushūru
